feature.label: Emmet for Eclipse
feature.description: Emmet is a toolkit for high-speed HTML, XML, XSL (or any other structured code format) coding and editing. The core of this plugin is a powerful abbreviation engine which allows you to expand expressions—similar to CSS selectors—into (X)HTML code.
